message.content:
cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the design of truthful mechanisms for auctions in three different set systems, which is a topic in algorithmic game theory (cs.GT). The set systems themselves involve graphs and network flows, which are topics in data structures (cs.DS) and algorithms (cs.AI). The use of matrix eigenvectors in the Vertex Cover mechanism suggests a connection to linear algebra (cs.DM), and the use of graph contraction in the Cut mechanism suggests a connection to information theory (cs.IT).
